----
$ curl 'https://dev.finpo.kr/user/me/profile-img' -i -X POST \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9..zNTHrdWjTppj3z0OJGKQmTaEcchbC0iupSvX3snLlqrvIzsLP3UCZbrEKSBL31P92m1E5VqXa9--LFYQ5LsWoQ' \
    -F 'profileImgFile=@imagefile.jpeg;type=image/jpeg'
----
